#### Modeling How Long It Will Take to Read The Text ####
 T = total time to read the book
 p = average time to read a page
 P = # pages (for this book, a constant)
 w = how long it takes to work a checkmark
 W = average # checkmarks per page 
 A = choosing to take the double your reading speed course
 B = choosing to take the double your reasoning speed course
Model Equation: T = pP + wWP or P(p + wW)
